TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit FileSystemAuditRule extends System.Security.AccessControl.AuditRule
Public NotInheritable Class FileSystemAuditRule Inherits AuditRule

summary.span: 表示定义文件或目录的审核规则的访问控制项 (ACE) 的抽象。

span.span: Represents an abstraction of an access control entry (ACE) that defines an audit rule for a file or directory.
This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类表示的基础的访问控制项 (ACE) 的指定的用户帐户，要提供 （读取、 写入等） 的访问类型的抽象，以及是否执行审核。The class represents an abstraction of an underlying access control entry (ACE) that specifies a user account, the type of access to provide (read, write, and so on), and whether to perform auditing. 此类还可以指定审核规则是如何从继承和传播到对象。This class can also specify how audit rules are inherited from and propagated to objects. 若要允许文件和目录审核，在 Windows NT 或更高版本，必须在计算机上启用审核访问安全策略。To permit file and directory auditing on Windows NT or later, you must enable Audit Access Security policy on your machine. 默认情况下，此策略设置为无审核。By default, this policy is set to No Auditing. 若要启用审核访问安全策略，请执行以下步骤：To enable the Audit Access Security policy, perform the following steps: 1. 打开**本地安全设置**Microsoft 管理控制台 (MMC) 管理单元中，位于管理工具文件夹中。Open the **Local Security Settings** Microsoft Management Console (MMC) snap-in, located in the Administrative Tools folder. 2. 展开本地策略文件夹并左键单击审核策略文件夹。Expand the Local Policies folder and left-click the Audit Policy folder. 3. 双击**审核对象访问**上的 MMC 管理单元中，右窗格中的条目或右键单击，然后选择要显示的属性**审核对象访问属性**对话框。Double-click the **Audit object access** entry on the right pane of the MMC snap-in, or right-click and choose Properties to display the **Audit object access properties** dialog box. 4. 选择**成功**或**失败**复选框，以记录成功或失败。Select the **Success** or **Failure** check boxes to log successes or failures. 请注意，用户帐户的审核规则的相同用户帐户需要相应的访问规则。Note that an audit rule for a user account requires a corresponding access rule for the same user account. 使用类，以创建新的审核规则。Use the class to create a new audit rule. 此规则使用，可以保持或类。You can persist this rule using the or class. ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用类来添加，然后从文件删除的审核规则。The following code example uses the class to add and then remove an audit rule from a file. 你必须提供有效的用户或组帐户以运行此示例。You must supply a valid user or group account to run this example. [!code-csharp[AccessControl.FileSystemAuditRule#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/AccessControl.FileSystemAuditRule/cs/sample.cs#1)] [!code-vb[AccessControl.FileSystemAuditRule#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/AccessControl.FileSystemAuditRule/vb/sample.vb#1)]

span.span: An object that encapsulates a reference to a user account.

param.name: fileSystemRights
param.span: 值之一，该值指定与审核规则关联的操作的类型。

span.span: One of the values that specifies the type of operation associated with the audit rule.

param.name: flags
param.span: 值之一，该值指定何时执行审核。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class using a reference to a user account, a value that specifies the type of operation associated with the audit rule, and a value that specifies when to perform auditing.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此构造函数来创建您可以保留使用的审核规则或类。Use this constructor to create an audit rule that you can persist using the or class. 审核规则可确定何时以及如何对系统对象执行操作如文件和文件夹，会记录。Audit rules determine when and how actions performed on system objects, such as files and folders, are logged.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此构造函数来创建您可以保留使用的审核规则或类。Use this constructor to create an audit rule that you can persist using the or class. 审核规则可确定何时以及如何对系统对象执行操作如文件和文件夹，会记录。Audit rules determine when and how actions performed on system objects, such as files and folders, are logged. `identity`参数必须标识当前的计算机或域上有效的帐户。The `identity` parameter must identify a valid account on the current computer or domain. 该字符串采用以下格式，其中`DOMAIN`是有效的域名或计算机名的名称和`account`域或计算机上的有效用户帐户的名称： `DOMAIN\account`。The string takes the following form, where `DOMAIN` is the name of a valid domain or computer name and `account` is the name of a valid user account on a domain or computer: `DOMAIN\account`. ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用类来添加，然后从文件删除的审核规则。The following code example uses the class to add and then remove an audit rule from a file. 你必须提供有效的用户或组帐户以运行此示例。You must supply a valid user or group account to run this example. [!code-csharp[AccessControl.FileSystemAuditRule#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/AccessControl.FileSystemAuditRule/cs/sample.cs#1)] [!code-vb[AccessControl.FileSystemAuditRule#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/AccessControl.FileSystemAuditRule/vb/sample.vb#1)]
